dict.acceptation: 环境，外界；周围，围绕；工作平台；（运行）环境；

sent.orig: This article mainly researches from aspects, which includes social environment, family environment, unit environment, community environment.
sent.trans: 本文章主要从社会环境、家庭环境、单位环境、社区环境几个方面研究。

sent.orig: The external environment includes the industrial environment and the location environment.
sent.trans: 外部环境因素包括影响企业决策的产业环境和区位环境。

sent.orig: Reflect its environment is turn the weak oxidation and reduction environment into hot dry oxidation environment.
sent.trans: 反映其沉积环境由古新世至始新世早期弱还原与弱氧化交替环境转化成了干旱炎热的氧化环境。

sent.orig: This paper states some related concepts, Such as Geology environment, karst environment and geology environment system.
sent.trans: 本文在陈述有关概念，如地质环境、岩溶环境、地质环境系统。

sent.orig: Knowledge of environment policy about quality, implement environment policy, comply laws of environment.
sent.trans: 了解公司质量环境方针，配合执行公司环境管理规定，遵守相关法律法规。
